title: 12 Perch Land for Sale in a Peaceful Residential Area
details:
12 perch square land for sale in Piliyandala, Nampamunuwa area. peaceful residential area to live. central location to Piliyandala, Kottawa and Maharagama town. less than 2 minutes walk to the bus station (341, 296) this land is situated in the center where Piliyandala-Maharagama and Piliyandala Kottawa road connects.

please visit the location or call us on +94771915744
